channel.title: New tab, what do I populate it with?
channel.description:
Well the title says it all really. I have a tab and I don't know what to do with it. I've got 3 ideas on what to do: A 'better' donor tab instead of that nasty PI one in the equipment tab A Super donor tab, for anyone that has the second or above donor rank. A PK point exchange tab, you pay X points to get Y items. Here's the tab: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aZQQp6y.png[/img]
What I do with it, picks what I do with that notepad icon. The blank space next to the "I" in item, is reserved for an icon of some sort.

item.title: New tab, what do I populate it with?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:12, topic:480505”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=598738.msg4211999#msg4211999 date=1359695063]

Got a good hex code of orange?

www.colorpicker.com

Add 0x before the color code.

0xE0B21B is nice.

I’m familiar with adding 0x. AS3 uses it, though people on here hate Flash works… lol
[/quote]
No I think we’re fine with Flash, though it isn’t commonly accepted as a programming language. We all hate VB though. Everyone.[/quote]
You clearly didn’t see my release in the web section then ;).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:6, topic:480505”](Click here to buy admin $*)
(Click here to buy mod $)
(Click here to buy donar $)
(Click here to buy one free ban-anyone ticket $)
(Click here to buy owner $)
etc[/quote]
LOLOL

the elve age:

Changed the color of the “item %” to orange, that color is hideous.

Got a good hex code of orange?

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:8, topic:480505”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=598738.msg4210714#msg4210714 date=1359500790]

or create a note(s) system?

take a string the user typed and write it to the interface

Lol who would ever use a tab the way it was meant for
[/quote]

me. i’m pretty sure you use the stats tab to check stats etc[/quote]
Or is my stat tab really my friends list tab?
Kidding.
Plus, it was sarcasm.

item.title: New tab, what do I populate it with?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

JavaTC:

I always liked a news/update tab personally, then people actually read the patch notes of updates allot more than they do when just posted on the forums.

I could use my quest tab for that actually. It’s empty and would be perfect for that.
These are actually buttons, so I’d like something button specific.

Read full topic
